T02D1544:184a-1: shr'i badzra b'a r'a h'i s'a dha na n'a ma /
T02D1544:184a-3: dpal rdo rje phag mo sgrub pa'i thabs //
T02D1544:184a-4: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D1544:184a-5: dpal ldan nges brjod 'bum pa las btus lha mo'i 'khor lo ni //
T02D1544:184a-6: sgom pa'i chog sems can don gyi rgyur te drang don dang //
T02D1544:184a-7: nges don 'di ste drang pa'i don gyis 'og min gnas grub byed //
T02D1544:184a-8: nges pa'i don gyis phyag rgya chen po'i mtshan nyid thob par byed //
T02D1544:184a-9: drang don brjod par bya ste dang por re zhig
T02D1544:184a-10: rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gis bdag bsrung ba'i don
T02D1544:184a-11: du dam tshig gi ri lu khar bcug la phyi
T02D1544:184a-12: nas tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi bsgoms te //
T02D1544:184a-13: de nas phung po lnga'i nga rgyal bskyed par bya'o //
T02D1544:184a-14: gzugs kyi phung po la rnam par snang mdzad do //
T02D1544:184a-15: tshor ba'i phung po la rin chen 'byung ldan no //
T02D1544:184a-16: 'du shes kyi phung po la padma gar gyi dbang phyug go //
T02D1544:184a-17: 'du byed kyi phung po la rdo rje rgyal po'o //
T02D1544:184a-18: rnam par shes pa'i phung po la rdo rje sems dpa'o //
T02D1544:184a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid ni rdo rje phag mo'o //
T02D1544:184a-20: mig dag la gti mug rdo rje'o //
T02D1544:184a-21: rna ba dag la zhe sdang rdo rje'o //
T02D1544:184a-22: sna dag la phrag dog rdo rje'o //
T02D1544:184a-24: reg la ser sna rdo rje'o //
T02D1544:184a-25: skye mched thams cad la dbang phyug rdo rje'o //
T02D1544:184a-26: sa'i khams ni ltung byed ma'o //
T02D1544:184a-27: chu'i khams ni gsod byed ma'o //
T02D1544:184a-29: rlung gi khams ni gar gyi dbang phyug ma'o //
T02D1544:184a-30: nam mkha'i khams la padmo 'bar ma'o //
T02D1544:184a-31: de ltar phung po dang khams dang skye mched dag la lha rnams kyi rnam par dag pa'o //
T02D1544:184a-32: de nas rnal 'byor rgyud kyi cho gas gshin rje
T02D1544:184a-33: gshed pa sogs pa'i khro bo'i rgyal po dbang po
T02D1544:184a-34: rnams bsrung ba'i 'khor lo sgom par bya ste //
T02D1544:184a-35: 'khor lo'i gtso bo ni rdo rje h'um mdzad do //
T02D1544:184a-36: de yang phyag drug pa'i he ru ka'o //
T02D1544:184a-37: sngags pa de yis dang por ram las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mdun du bsgoms la //
T02D1544:184a-38: de'i dbus su h'um yig yongs su gyur pa las sna tshogs rdo rje gdong bzhi pa'o //
T02D1544:184b-0: sna tshogs rdo rje dang @184b nyi ma de dag
T02D1544:184b-1: ro gcig tu gyur pa las phyogs thams cad du
T02D1544:184b-2: rdo rje'i ra ba dang steng du rdo rje'i gur
T02D1544:184b-3: ro // 'og tu rdo rje'i sa gzhi bdud thams cad kyis mi phyed pa'o //
T02D1544:184b-4: ra ba'i phyir rol dang steng 'og tu mtshon cha sna tshogs su rung ba bsgom par bya'o //
T02D1544:184b-5: khro rgyal rnams la rim pa bzhin //
T02D1544:184b-6: gdan ni bstabs par byas nas su //
T02D1544:184b-7: zhal mdog phyag dang mtshon cha dang //
T02D1544:184b-8: g-yon brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis ni //
T02D1544:184b-9: rdo rje ra ba'i dbus su ni //
T02D1544:184b-10: 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa la dgod //
T02D1544:184b-11: aa yig sa bon las byung ba //
T02D1544:184b-12: de ni bsgoms nas de nas yang //
T02D1544:184b-13: gur gyi yang ni steng 'og tu //
T02D1544:184b-14: rtsibs gnyis kyang ni bya ba ste //
T02D1544:184b-15: re pha bcu gcig rnams kyis ni //
T02D1544:184b-16: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rim pa bzhin //
T02D1544:184b-17: nyi ma'i rkang pa de dag kyang //
T02D1544:184b-18: nyi ma bcu gcig po nyid kyi //
T02D1544:184b-19: so so'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du //
T02D1544:184b-20: der ni h'um yig dgod par bya //
T02D1544:184b-21: h'um yig las byung nyi mar gnas //
T02D1544:184b-22: khro rgyal rnams ni bsgom par bya //
T02D1544:184b-23: dbus ma'i nyi gdan la bsgoms pa //
T02D1544:184b-24: 'dren pa rdo rje h'um mdzad de //
T02D1544:184b-25: sngon po zhal gsum phyag drug pa //
T02D1544:184b-26: g-yas brkyang pa ni zhabs kyis mnan //
T02D1544:184b-27: rtsa ba'i zhal ni sngon po la //
T02D1544:184b-28: mi bzad mche gtsigs 'jigs pa po //
T02D1544:184b-29: g-yon dang g-yas ni dkar dang dmar //
T02D1544:184b-30: ji ltar rtsa gsum gnas pa'o //
T02D1544:184b-31: rdo rje gri gug rtse gsum pa //
T02D1544:184b-32: g-yas pa'i phyag ni rim pa bzhin //
T02D1544:184b-33: rdo rje dril bu thod pa dang //
T02D1544:184b-35: sna tshogs rdo rje ral pa yi //
T02D1544:184b-36: cod pan mi bskyod zla phyed yin //
T02D1544:184b-37: mgo bo'i phreng ba phrag la gnas //
T02D1544:184b-38: spyi bo la ni thod pa nyid //
T02D1544:184b-39: phyag rgya lnga ni rus las byas //
T02D1544:184b-40: rked pa stag gi pags pas dkris //
T02D1544:184b-41: spyan dgu ljags ni bsgyur ba ste //
T02D1544:184b-42: sprul gyi rgyan gyis klubs pa'o //
T02D1544:184b-44: 'dren pa bsgom mo de nas ni //
T02D1544:184b-45: h'um yig nag po las byung ba //
T02D1544:184b-46: shar gyi nyi mar dgod par bya //
T02D1544:184b-47: gshin rje gshed nag drag pa ste //
T02D1544:184b-48: g-yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis mnan //
T02D1544:184b-49: gnag dang dkar dang dmar ba'i zhal //
T02D1544:184b-50: gsus khyim che la spyan gsum pa //
T02D1544:184b-51: phyag rgya lnga dang thod pa yi //
T02D1544:184b-52: phreng ba rked la stag lpags so //
T02D1544:184b-53: kun gyi cod pan tha dad dang //
T02D1544:184b-54: sku mdog mtshon cha de dag la //
T02D1544:185a-2: dbyug pa 'khor lo rdo rje dag / g-yas pa'i
T02D1544:185a-3: phyag na rdo rje bdag / snying gar sdigs mdzub
T02D1544:185a-4: zhabs pa dang // dril bu dgra sta g-yon bsnams la //
T02D1544:185a-5: spyi bo sangs rgyas rnam snang mdzad //
T02D1544:185a-6: rdo rje cod pan gzhan min pa'o //
T02D1544:185a-7: h'um yig dkar po las byung ba //
T02D1544:185a-8: dkar dang sngo dang dmar ba'i zhal //
T02D1544:185a-9: shes rab mthar byad nyi mar dgod //
T02D1544:185a-10: lho ru rin chen cod pan can //
T02D1544:185a-11: ral gri rdo rje dbyug pa ni //
T02D1544:185a-12: g-yas pa'i phyag na rim pa bzhin //
T02D1544:185a-13: snying gar sdigs mdzub zhabs pa dang //
T02D1544:185a-14: dril bu dgra sta g-yon pa ni //
T02D1544:185a-15: h'um yig dmar po las grub pa //
T02D1544:185a-16: dmar dang sngo dang dkar ba'i zhal //
T02D1544:185a-17: padma mthar byed nyi mar dgod //
T02D1544:185a-18: nub tu 'od dpag med cod pan //
T02D1544:185a-19: gtun shing rdo rje ral gri bsnams //
T02D1544:185a-21: snying gar sdigs mdzub zhabs pa dang //
T02D1544:185a-22: dril bu dgra sna g-yon pa la //
T02D1544:185a-23: h'um yig sngon po las byung ba //
T02D1544:185a-24: don yod grub pa'i cod pan can //
T02D1544:185a-25: sngon dang dmar dang dkar ba'i zhal //
T02D1544:185a-27: sna tshogs rdo rje de bzhin du //
T02D1544:185a-28: 'khor lo gtun shing g-yas pa na //
T02D1544:185a-29: dril bu sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang //
T02D1544:185a-30: dgra sta yang ni g-yon pa na //
T02D1544:185a-31: bgegs mthar byed pa nyi mar dgod //
T02D1544:185a-32: byang du bdud rtsi 'khyil pa yang //
T02D1544:185a-33: h'um yig sngon po las byung ba //
T02D1544:185a-34: me ru nyi ma mi g-yo dgod //
T02D1544:185a-35: sngo dang dmar dang dkar ba'i zhal //
T02D1544:185a-36: dbu rgyan rnam par snang mdzad dpal //
T02D1544:185a-37: ral gri rdo rje de bzhin du //
T02D1544:185a-38: 'khor lo g-yas pa'i phyag na bsnams //
T02D1544:185a-39: snying gar sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang //
T02D1544:185a-40: dril bu dgra sta g-yon na'o //
T02D1544:185a-41: h'um yig sngon po las byung ba //
T02D1544:185a-42: sdo dang dmar dang dkar ba'i zhal //
T02D1544:185a-43: srin por 'dod pa'i rgyal po ste //
T02D1544:185a-44: rin chen 'byung ldan cod pan can //
T02D1544:185a-45: phyag gnyis khams gsum rnam rgyal gyi //
T02D1544:185a-46: phyag rgya dag ni bcings pa'o //
T02D1544:185a-47: g-yas na rdo rje ral gri ste //
T02D1544:185a-48: g-yon na zhags pa lcags kyu'o //
T02D1544:185a-49: h'um yig sngon po las byung ba //
T02D1544:185a-50: 'od dpag med pa'i cod pan can //
T02D1544:185a-51: sngags pas dbyug sngon dgod par bya //
T02D1544:185a-52: rlung du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la //
T02D1544:185a-53: rtsa ba g-yas dang cig shos dag / sngo dang dmar dang dkar ba'i zhal //
T02D1544:185b-0: dbyug pa de @185b bzhin ral gri ste //
T02D1544:185b-1: rdo rje phyag g-yas rim pa bzhin //
T02D1544:185b-2: g-yon na sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang //
T02D1544:185b-3: padma nyi ma nyid yon no //
T02D1544:185b-4: h'um yig sngon po las byung ba //
T02D1544:185b-5: don yod grub pa'i don pan can //
T02D1544:185b-6: stobs po che ni sku mdog sngo //
T02D1544:185b-7: dbang ldan nyi mar sngags pas dgod //
T02D1544:185b-8: nag dang dmar dang dkar ba'i zhal //
T02D1544:185b-10: dbyug pa ral gri de bzhin du //
T02D1544:185b-11: 'khor lo g-yas la rim pa bzhin //
T02D1544:185b-12: snying gar sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang //
T02D1544:185b-13: rtse gsum dgra ste rim pas so //
T02D1544:185b-14: h'um yig ljang gu las byung ba //
T02D1544:185b-15: mi bskyod pa yi cod pan can //
T02D1544:185b-16: ljang gu dmar dang dkar ba'i zhal //
T02D1544:185b-17: spyan gsum khyab bdag gsus pa 'phyang //
T02D1544:185b-18: g-yon dang g-yas pa'i phyag gnyis kyis //
T02D1544:185b-19: spyi bor gtsug tor 'dzin par mdzad //
T02D1544:185b-20: rdo rje padma g-yas dag la //
T02D1544:185b-21: gzhan la sdig mdzub ral gri'o //
T02D1544:185b-22: nam mkhar nyi ma gnod pa ni //
T02D1544:185b-23: tshangs pa'i gnas su rnam bsam bya //
T02D1544:185b-24: sngon po'i h'um yig las byung ba //
T02D1544:185b-25: mi bskyod pa yi cod pan can //
T02D1544:185b-26: 'og gi nyi mar gnod mdzes rgyal //
T02D1544:185b-27: gnag dang dkar dang dmar ba'i zhal //
T02D1544:185b-28: rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen dag / g-yas pa'i 'jig rten rim pa bzhin //
T02D1544:185b-29: snying gar sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang //
T02D1544:185b-30: ral gri padma g-yon pa la //
T02D1544:185b-31: de rnams rnam par bsgoms nas su //
T02D1544:185b-32: 'jigs byed khro bo dgod pa ni //
T02D1544:185b-33: rnal 'byor pa yis nye bar bsdus //
T02D1544:185b-34: rang gi lus la gzhug par bya //
T02D1544:185b-35: dpung pa g-yon par gshin rje gshed //
T02D1544:185b-36: g-yas par shes rab mthar byed dgod //
T02D1544:185b-37: lag g-yon padma mthar byed do //
T02D1544:185b-38: g-yas la bgegs mthar byed pa dgod //
T02D1544:185b-39: g-yon pa'i brla la mi g-yo ba //
T02D1544:185b-41: rkang pa g-yon la dbyug sngon te //
T02D1544:185b-42: rkang pa g-yas pa stobs po che //
T02D1544:185b-43: spyi gtsug gnas su gtsug tor che //
T02D1544:185b-44: gnod mdzes rgyal po bshad lam dgod //
T02D1544:185b-45: snying gar rdo rje h'um mdzad do //
T02D1544:185b-46: rang mtshan yi ge dang po dgod //
T02D1544:185b-47: yam pram bam bam aam tam nam mam aum sum bam /
T02D1544:185b-48: de ltar bsgrub pa'i cho ga ni //
T02D1544:185b-49: sngags pas rim bzhin byas nas ni //
T02D1544:185b-50: bdag nyid khro bcas rdo rje yis //
T02D1544:185b-51: h'um mdzad du ni bsgom par bya //
T02D1544:186a-1: gnod mdzes bka' bsgo phur bus gdab //
T02D1544:186a-2: aom gha gha gh'a ta ya h'a ta ya sarba dusht'am phat /
T02D1544:186a-3: k'i la ya k'i la ya /
T02D1544:186a-4: aom sum bha ni sum bha h'um /
T02D1544:186a-6: aom grihn'a pa ya grihn'a pa ya h'um phat /
T02D1544:186a-7: aom a'a na ya ho: bha ga w'am bidy'i r'a dza h'um phat /
T02D1544:186a-8: khro bo'i gzugs can 'di yis ni //
T02D1544:186a-9: log 'dren bgegs rnams kun nas ni //
T02D1544:186a-10: cho ga bzhin du phur bus gdab //
T02D1544:186a-12: thams cad la'o lte ba nas //
T02D1544:186a-13: 'og gi cha ni mdung ltar du //
T02D1544:186a-14: rnam bsam khro chen bgegs mthar byed //
T02D1544:186a-15: stod ni zhal gsum phyag drug pa //
T02D1544:186a-16: 'og gi bgegs tshogs la gzigs nas //
T02D1544:186a-17: de nas sngags ni yang dag brjod //
T02D1544:186a-18: rdo rje phur bu gzung nas ni //
T02D1544:186a-19: bgegs kyi lus la g-yo ba med /
T02D1544:186a-20: aom gha gha gh'a ta ya gh'a ta ya sarba du sht'am h'um phat //
T02D1544:186a-21: k'i la k'i la ya sarba p'a pam phat /
T02D1544:186a-22: h'um h'um h'um badzra k'i la badzra dha ra a'a dzny'a pa ya ti /
T02D1544:186a-23: sarba bighn'am k'a ya w'aka tsittam k'i la ya k'i la ya h'um phat /
T02D1544:186a-24: rdo rje tho ba phyag bsnams pa'i //
T02D1544:186a-25: gnod mdzes rgyas po bsgom par bya //
T02D1544:186a-26: sngags rig pa yi cho ga 'dis //
T02D1544:186a-27: rdo rje phur bus brdung bar bya //
T02D1544:186a-28: aom badzra mudga ra a'a ko ta ya /
T02D1544:186a-29: tishtha tishtha da sha ti k'i la ye /
T02D1544:186a-31: de nas kun nas rdo rje'i ma //
T02D1544:186a-32: rnam par 'phro ba nges par bsam //
T02D1544:186a-33: de de de yi sreg bzhin du //
T02D1544:186a-35: de nas rang gi snying gar yi ge aa las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor /
T02D1544:186a-36: de'i steng du bam yig 'od zer sna tshogs rnam par 'phro bar bsam par bya'o //
T02D1544:186a-37: de'i snang bas mdun du bla ma dang sangs rgyas
T02D1544:186a-38: la sogs pa rnams bltas la yang dag par mchod
T02D1544:186a-39: de phyag byas bzod pa gsol /
T02D1544:186a-40: de nas dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro bar bya'o //
T02D1544:186a-41: aom sva bh'a ba shuddha: sarba dharm'a: sva bh'a ba shuddho& ham //
T02D1544:186a-42: yang ni stong par rnam bsam bya //
T02D1544:186a-43: sems tsam la ni nges gnas te //
T02D1544:186a-44: byang chub tshogs ni bsgoms pa yis //
T02D1544:186a-45: snang ba tsam gyis shes pa la /
T02D1544:186a-46: aom sh'u n+ya t'a dznya na badzra sva bh'a ba a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1544:186a-47: de nas sad nas rten dang brten pa'i tshul gyis
T02D1544:186a-48: bhee ram la sogs pa yang dag par gnas pa
T02D1544:186a-50: yi yig yongs su gyur pa las /
T02D1544:186b-0: rlung gi dkyil 'khor rgyal @186b mtshan gyis mtshan pa gzhu'i dbyibs can kha dog sngon po'o //
T02D1544:186b-1: de'i steng du ram las me'i dkyil 'khor gru gsum kha dog dmar po'o //
T02D1544:186b-2: de'i steng du bam yig yongs su gyur pa las chu'i dkyil 'khor zlum po kha dog dkar po'o //
T02D1544:186b-3: de'i steng du lam yig yongs su gyur pa las sa'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi kha dog ser po'o //
T02D1544:186b-4: de'i steng du sum yig yongs su g-yo ba las
T02D1544:186b-5: ri'i rgyal po ri rab gru bzhi pa rin po
T02D1544:186b-6: che sna bzhi'i rang bzhin can rtse mo brgyad kyis
T02D1544:186b-8: de'i steng du h'um las nges par 'byung ba sna tshogs rdo rje'o //
T02D1544:186b-9: de'i steng du pam yongs su gyur pa las sna
T02D1544:186b-10: tshogs padma 'dab ma brgyad pa lte ba dang ge
T02D1544:186b-12: de'i steng du a'a li k'a li'i sbyor ba ste //
T02D1544:186b-13: me long lta bu'i ye shes zla ba dang /
T02D1544:186b-14: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes nyi ma'o //
T02D1544:186b-15: de dag tu srog song ba ni bam yig tu brjod de so sor rtog pa'i ye shes so //
T02D1544:186b-16: de dag gcig tu gyur pa bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes so //
T02D1544:186b-17: gzugs yongs su grub pa ni chos nyid dag pa'i ye shes te /
T02D1544:186b-18: ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid lus //
T02D1544:186b-19: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma ru grags //
T02D1544:186b-20: de yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje phag mo
T02D1544:186b-21: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs shing 'jigs byed dang
T02D1544:186b-22: // dus mtshan ma mnan pa 'khor lo dang bcas sgrub pa'i dur khrod brgyad kyis bskor ba'o //
T02D1544:186b-23: de la bcom ldan 'das ma ni sku mdog dmar
T02D1544:186b-24: po zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma spyan gsum ma dbu
T02D1544:186b-25: skra grol ba gcer bu dum bus brgyan pa'i ske
T02D1544:186b-26: rags can / zhabs g-yon brkyang bas bzhugs pa /
T02D1544:186b-27: 'jigs byed chen po'i cha lugs can /
T02D1544:186b-28: g-yon pa'i phyag na rdo rje kha tv'am ga dang thod par bdud ma rungs pa'i khrag bsnams pa /
T02D1544:186b-29: g-yas pas phyogs thams cad du gdug pa rnams la sdigs mdzub mdzad pa'i rdo rje can /
T02D1544:186b-30: bskal pa'i me ltar gzi brjid che //
T02D1544:186b-31: khrag la dgyes shing khrag 'dzag pa //
T02D1544:186b-32: bde chen thugs rje'i bdag nyid can //
T02D1544:186b-33: phyag rgya lnga yis brgyan pa'o //
T02D1544:186b-34: sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad che //
T02D1544:186b-35: thub pa chen po thub chen ldan //
T02D1544:186b-36: gsang sngags tshul chen las byung ba //
T02D1544:186b-37: gsang sngags tshul chen bdag nyid can /
T02D1544:186b-38: rig pa 'dis ni spyi bor rnam par snang mdzad kyis rgyas btab pa ste /
T02D1544:187a-0: sna tshogs pa padma'i lte bar rtsa ba'i gdan du @187a * //
T02D1544:187a-1: rigs ldan ma rdo rje phag mo'o //
T02D1544:187a-2: padma'i shar gyi 'dab mar shar gyi lus 'phags bdag gi gdan du rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'o //
T02D1544:187a-3: lho'i 'dab mar 'dzam bu'i gling gzhan gyi gdan du l'a ma'o //
T02D1544:187a-4: nub kyi 'dab ma rab longs spyod sngags kyi gdan du kha nda ro h'a'o //
T02D1544:187a-5: byang gi 'dab mar sgra mi snyan de kho na nyid kyi gdan du gzugs can ma'o //
T02D1544:187a-6: thugs gsung ye shes sku ste 'khor lo bzhi'i dbye
T02D1544:187a-7: bas mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa rnal 'byor ma
T02D1544:187a-8: bzhi nag mo dmar mo ser mo ljang gu ste
T02D1544:187a-11: g-yon gyis kha tv'am ga dang thod pa bsnams pa /
T02D1544:187a-12: g-yas kyis cang te'u dang gri gug go //
T02D1544:187a-13: spyan gsum pa dbu skra grol ba gcer bu g-yas brkyang bas gdan la bzhugs pa /
T02D1544:187a-14: phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan ma /
T02D1544:187a-15: mche ba rnam par gtsigs pa'i zhal /
T02D1544:187a-19: don yod grub pas rnal 'byor ma 'di rnams la rgyas btab pa'o //
T02D1544:187a-20: mtshams su gling phran nye ba'i gnas su byang chub
T02D1544:187a-21: kyi sems kyi snod bzhi ste ye shes kyi 'khor
T02D1544:187a-23: de nas sa 'og me dang rlung gi dkyil 'khor
T02D1544:187a-24: gyi mtshams su ri rab kyi phyogs mtshams su dmyal
T02D1544:187a-26: de la shar gyi dur khrod dkyil 'khor gyi shar sgor mdung gis 'phigs par khva gdong ma'o //
T02D1544:187a-27: lho'i dur khrod sgor tshig pa'i ror 'ug gdong ma'o //
T02D1544:187a-28: nub kyi dur khrod sgor brnags pa'i drir khyi gdong ma'o //
T02D1544:187a-29: byang gi dur khrod sgror rul pa can du phag gdong ma'o //
T02D1544:187a-30: de nas dbang ldan gyi mtshams su dur khrod byis pa shi par gshin rje brtan mo'o //
T02D1544:187a-31: rlung gi mtshams su dur khrod sprul gyis zin par gshin rje pho nya mo'o //
T02D1544:187a-32: srin po'i mtshams su dur khrod 'jigs pa'i dbus su gshin rje mche ba ma'o //
T02D1544:187a-33: me'i mtshams kyi dur khrod lhag ma can du gshin rje 'joms ma'o//
T02D1544:187a-34: de ltar na g-yas skor dang g-yon skor gyis lugs
T02D1544:187a-35: su 'byung ba dang lugs las bzlog pas dur khrod
T02D1544:187a-36: brgyad du longs spyod ma rnams te /
T02D1544:187a-37: ji ltar mkha' 'gro ma lus la sogs pa de
T02D1544:187a-38: ltar khva gdong ma la sogs pa'i sku mdog dang
T02D1544:187a-39: phyag mtshan dang rgyas gdab kyang ngo //
T02D1544:187b-0: mtshams su gnas ma @187b rnams ni gzugs gnyis ma
T02D1544:187b-1: yid 'phrog pa sems can gyi don mdzad par brtson
T02D1544:187b-2: pa'o // rnal 'byor ma 'di dag thams cad yi
T02D1544:187b-3: dags kyi gdan can mgo bo'i phreng ba 'dzin pa
T02D1544:187b-4: dpral bar rdo rje'i phreng ba'o //
T02D1544:187b-5: de nas gzhan yang bcu gnyis lha'i rnal 'byor gyis sbyar bar bya ste /
T02D1544:187b-6: de dag kyang gang zhe na /
T02D1544:187b-7: rab tu dga' ba ni mkha' 'gro ma'o //
T02D1544:187b-8: dri ma med pa ni l'a ma'o //
T02D1544:187b-9: 'od byed pa ni khanda ro h'i'o //
T02D1544:187b-11: sbyang dka' ba ni khva gdong ma'o //
T02D1544:187b-12: mngon du gyur pa ni lug gdong ma'o //
T02D1544:187b-13: ring du song ba ni khyi gdong ma'o //
T02D1544:187b-14: mi g-yo ba ni phag gdong ma'o //
T02D1544:187b-15: legs pa'i blo gros ni gshin rje brtan ma'o //
T02D1544:187b-16: chos kyi sprin ni gshin rje pho nya ma'o //
T02D1544:187b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa can ni gshin rje mche ba ma'o //
T02D1544:187b-18: rdo rje spyod pa can ni gshin rje 'joms ma'o //
T02D1544:187b-19: dbus kyi rdo rje phag mo ni bla na med
T02D1544:187b-20: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sa bcu
T02D1544:187b-22: de nas yang dag bshad bya ba //
T02D1544:187b-23: gnas sogs ming yig dang po'o //
T02D1544:187b-24: rang gi lus la dgod par bya //
T02D1544:187b-25: mum a'am pam mam tam shum sham phum glam blam slam gham aum /
T02D1544:187b-26: rtsa ba'i gdan gsang ba'i 'khor lo rdo rje phag mo rigs ldan ma'o //
T02D1544:187b-27: bdag gi gdan snying gi padmar rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'o //
T02D1544:187b-28: gzhan gyi gdan lkog ma'i padmar lnga ma'o //
T02D1544:187b-29: sngags kyi gdan lte ba'i padmar khanda ro ha'o //
T02D1544:187b-30: de kho na nyid kyi gdan dpral bar gzugs can ma'o //
T02D1544:187b-31: thams cad padma'i gdan gtsug tor gyi padmar dpal he ru ka'o //
T02D1544:187b-32: 'di dag ni ye shes kyi 'khor lo ste g-yas skor gyis so //
T02D1544:187b-33: khva gdong ma la sogs pa sgo brgyad du dgod pa brjod par bya ste //
T02D1544:187b-34: mdung gis 'bigs pa kha'i sgor khva gdong ma'o //
T02D1544:187b-35: tshig pa'i ro sna bug g-yas kyi sgor 'ug gdong ma'o //
T02D1544:187b-36: brnags pa'i drir bshad pa'i sgor khyi gdong ma'o //
T02D1544:187b-37: rul pa can sna bug g-yon pa'i sgor phag gdong ma'o //
T02D1544:187b-39: byis pa shi ba rna ba g-yon pa'i sgor gshin rje brtan ma'o //
T02D1544:187b-40: sbrul gyis zos pa rna ba g-yas pa'i sgor gshin rje pho nya ma'o //
T02D1544:187b-41: dur khrod 'jigs pa'i dbus su mig g-yas pa'i sgor gshin rje mche ba can ma'o //
T02D1544:187b-42: lhag ma spyan mig g-yon pa'i sgor gshin rje 'joms ma'o //
T02D1544:188a-2: skad cig rnam pa'i rnal 'byor bdag / skad cig gis ni sku gcig 'gyur //
T02D1544:188a-3: de nyid gsum gyis byin gyis brlab par bya ste /
T02D1544:188a-5: sarba b'i ra yo gi ni k'a ya w'a ka tsitta badzra sba bha wa a'atma ko& ham /
T02D1544:188a-6: aom badzra shuddha: sarba dharm'a badzra shuddho& ham /
T02D1544:188a-7: de nas go cha gnyis shes nas //
T02D1544:188a-8: ye shes 'khor lo rnam par sgom //
T02D1544:188a-9: sngags dang phyag rgya'i sbyor shes pas //
T02D1544:188a-10: dam tshig 'khor lo ma myur gzhug / de nas go cha gnyis bshad par bya ste //
T02D1544:188a-12: na ma: hi spyi bor ro //
T02D1544:188a-13: sv'a h'a hu gtsug tor tu'o //
T02D1544:188a-14: po sha ta he phrag pa gnyis su'o //
T02D1544:188a-15: h'um h'um ho mig gnyis la'o //
T02D1544:188a-16: phat ham yan lag thams cad la ste mtshon cha'o //
T02D1544:188a-17: dang por rdo rje sems dpa'i ste //
T02D1544:188a-18: gnyis pa rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs //
T02D1544:188a-19: gsum pa padma gar dbang phyug / bzhi pa dpal ldan he ru kar brjod //
T02D1544:188a-20: rdo rje nyi ma rta mchog ste //
T02D1544:188a-21: go cha drug gis 'di la bsrungs //
T02D1544:188a-22: aom bam rdo rje phag mo'o //
T02D1544:188a-27: phat phat tsandi ka ste yan lag thams cad la mtshon cha'o //
T02D1544:188a-28: lte ba snying ga de bzhin kha //
T02D1544:188a-29: mgo dang spyi gtsug mtshon cha nyid //
T02D1544:188a-30: mdzub mo mdud byas gung mo nges par sbyar //
T02D1544:188a-31: mthe bong rdo rje brtan po rab tu sbyar //
T02D1544:188a-32: de nas dpral ba'i dbus su rab bzhag nas //
T02D1544:188a-33: bskor zhing bskor bas kun du sgyur bar byed pa ste //
T02D1544:188a-34: rkang pa mnan zhing gyen du blta //
T02D1544:188a-35: gyen du phem gyi sgra sgrogs shing //
T02D1544:188a-36: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa'i //
T02D1544:188a-37: dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma rnams dgug / aom yo ga shuddha: sarba dharm'a yo ga shuddho& ham /
T02D1544:188a-38: ji ltar bltams pa tsam gyis ni //
T02D1544:188a-39: de bzhin kun du khrus gsol ba //
T02D1544:188a-40: lha yi chu ni dag pa yis //
T02D1544:188a-41: de bzhin bdag gis khrus bya'o //
T02D1544:188a-42: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa bhi she ka sa ma ya shri ye h'um /
T02D1544:188a-44: rdo rje phag mo'i snying po'i sngags bzla zhing sbyin sreg bya ste /
T02D1544:188a-45: aom badzra bee ro tsa n'i ye sv'a h'a /
T02D1544:188a-46: 'di ni snying po'i sngags yi ge bcu pa ste pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i dag pa'o //
T02D1544:188a-47: aom sarba buddha d'a ki n'i ye badzra warna n'i ye h'um h'um phat sv'ah'a /
T02D1544:188b-0: nye ba'i snying @188b po'i sngags yi ge bcu dgu po'i //
T02D1544:188b-1: aom pam yom mom hrem hrim h'um phat /
T02D1544:188b-2: 'di ni yi ge brgyad pa'i go cha'i sngags so //
T02D1544:188b-3: aom sum bha ni sum bha badzra d'a ki n'i hum h'um phat /
T02D1544:188b-4: bcu bzhi pa shar gyi zhal rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'i sngags so //
T02D1544:188b-5: aom grihna grihna badzra l'a me h'um h'um phat /
T02D1544:188b-6: yi ge bcu gnyis pa lho'i zhal l'a ma'i sngags so //
T02D1544:188b-7: aom grihn'a pa ya grihn'a pa ya badzra khanda ro he h'um h'um phat /
T02D1544:188b-8: yi ge bco brgyad pa nub kyi zhal khanda ro h'i'i sngags so //
T02D1544:188b-9: aom a'a na ya ho bha ga b'am badzra r'a dza badzra r'u pi ni h'um h'um phat /
T02D1544:188b-10: yi ge bco brgyad pa byang gi zhal gzugs can ma'i sngags so //
T02D1544:188b-11: lha mo bzhi ste gling bzhi pa'i sngags so ;
T02D1544:188b-12: / aom na mo bha ga wa te w'i re sh'a ya badzra k'a k'a sye h'um h'um phat /
T02D1544:188b-13: aom ma h'a ka lp'a gni sam ni bh'a ya badzra au lu k'a sye h'um h'um phat /
T02D1544:188b-14: aom dza ta ma ku totka t'a ya badzra shva n'a sye h'um h'um phat /
T02D1544:188b-15: aom damsht'a ka r'a gra bh'i sha na mu kh'a ya badzra s'u k'a r'a sye h'um h'um phat /
T02D1544:188b-16: aom sa ha sra bhu dza bh'a sur'a ya ya ma da dhi h'um h'um phat /
T02D1544:188b-17: aom pa ra shu p'a sho dya ta sh'u la
T02D1544:188b-18: kha tvam ga dha ri ne badzra ya ma d'u
T02D1544:188b-20: aom by'a ghr'a dzi na aam ba ra bha r'a
T02D1544:188b-21: ya badzra ya ma dam sht'a ni h'um h'um phat
T02D1544:188b-22: / aom ma h'a dhum mbran dha k'a ra wa
T02D1544:188b-23: bu sh'a ya badzra ya ma ma th'a n'i ye
T02D1544:188b-24: / h'um h'um phat // lha mo brgyad kyi rkang pa brgyad kyi sngags so //
T02D1544:188b-25: gtor ma spyad ba'i sngags ni /
T02D1544:188b-26: aom badzra kro dhe shva ri sarba dra bya ni bi shva dha ni h'um phat /
T02D1544:188b-29: h'um gis gzi brjod bskyid pa'o //
T02D1544:188b-32: ksha yig gis gshegs su gsol ba'o //
T02D1544:188b-33: lag pa g-yon pas ni sbyang ba'o //
T02D1544:188b-34: g-yas kyis ni rtogs par bya'o //
T02D1544:188b-35: thal mo gshibs te brkyang bas don ni gzi brjid bskyed do //
T02D1544:188b-36: nam mkha' lding gi phyag rgyas ni bdud rtsis bya'o //
T02D1544:188b-37: khams gsum rnam rgyal gyi phyag rgyas ni dgug go //
T02D1544:188b-38: rdo rje'i phyag rgyas ni stab cing lag pa'i rgyab tu se gol gsum gyis gshegs su gsol lo //
T02D1544:188b-40: dza: h'um bam ho: badzra d'a ki n'i sa ma ya stvam dri shya ho //
T02D1544:188b-41: mtshan phyed na rdo rje thal mo kha gyen du phye la gtar ma gtang ngo //
T02D1544:188b-42: aom kha kha kh'a he kh'a hi sarba yaksha r'aksha sa /
T02D1544:188b-48: ai mam pa lim grihna na tu /
T02D1544:189a-7: ma ma sarba ka ra ta ya /
T02D1544:189a-8: sadgu kham bi bri ddha ye sa h'a yi ka bha bandu hum h'um phat phat sv'a h'a /
T02D1544:189a-9: gtor ma gtang ba'i sngags so //
T02D1544:189a-10: yul dang grong gi bdag po la gtor ma sbyin te /
T02D1544:189a-11: yi ge mi mnyam pa ni thog ma'am dbus sam tha ma'i yi ge'o //
T02D1544:189a-12: yi ge mnyam pa ni dang po'am tha ma'i yi ge'o //
T02D1544:189a-13: de nyid gsum gyis byin gyis brlabs te /
T02D1544:189a-14: aom a'a: h'um kshe tra ba la ba li grihna
T02D1544:189a-15: grihna sa pa ri w'a re bhya: sarba sa tva
T02D1544:189a-16: n'am sh'i ti tsetta ni ku ru sv'a h'a /
T02D1544:189a-17: aom ha ri ti pande kye pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1544:189a-18: 'phrog ma la chang bu gnyis byin nas /
T02D1544:189a-19: aom du ti kye aa gra gra sam pra t'i tstsha sv'a h'a /
T02D1544:189a-20: kha kha kh'a hi kh'a hi au tsi shta ba lim au tsi shta bhaksha bhaksha sv'a h'a /
T02D1544:189a-21: bstabs pa'i cho ga bshad par bya ste /
T02D1544:189a-22: aom aa ho ksha rim pas gnas pa rnams kyis sbyang ba la sogs pa bya'o //
T02D1544:189a-23: zla ba zhu ba lta bur bsgom ste /
T02D1544:189a-24: rim gyis snod de nas ni thig le zla ba'i
T02D1544:189a-25: 'od zer dag gis nges par lag pa'i padma'i ming
T02D1544:189a-26: med nis gzhir phyi rol ni /
T02D1544:189a-27: gru gsum byas nas nang du nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lta bu'i zlum po de'i dbus su ni /
T02D1544:189a-28: ye shes 'khor lo srid pa gsum yang chud pa'i dkyil 'khor 'khor lo bsam bya dang /
T02D1544:189a-29: zhing gsal de la sngags kyi tshig 'di rnams kyis bstabs par bya ste /
T02D1544:189a-30: aom a'a: h'um ho sku gsung thugs rdo rje can la'o //
T02D1544:189a-31: de nas aa a'a ai a'i ri r'i au a'u
T02D1544:189a-32: li l'i aam a'a: / rnam par shes pa la
T02D1544:189a-34: nam mkha' la sogs pa'i khams rnams so //
T02D1544:189a-35: aa a'a ae aee aar a'ar ao aoo aa la
T02D1544:189a-36: a'a la aam aa: / dbang po drug dang yul
T02D1544:189a-37: drug go // ha h'a ya y'a ra r'a wa
T02D1544:189a-38: w'a la l'a ham ha: / thabs dang shes rab
T02D1544:189a-40: las kyi dbang po zhe sdang rdo rje las sogs pa'i rang bzhin no //
T02D1544:189a-41: ka k'a kha kh'a ga g'a gha gh'a da d'a /
T02D1544:189a-42: tsa ts'a tsha tsh'a dza dz'a dzha dzh'u nya ny'a /
T02D1544:189a-43: ta t'a tha th'a da d'a dha dh'a na n'a /
T02D1544:189a-44: pa p'a pha ph'a ba b'a bha bh'a ma m'a /
T02D1544:189a-45: ta t'a tha th'a da d'a dha dh'a na n'a /
T02D1544:189a-46: sa s'a da d'a sha sh'a sha sh'a /
T02D1544:189a-47: thka thk'a ha h'a ya y'a ra r'a la l'a wa w'a ksha ksh'a /
T02D1544:189a-48: thabs dang shes rab sum cu rtsa drug gi rigs
T02D1544:189a-49: rnams la rnal 'byor bas bstabs pa'i cho ga 'di
T02D1544:189a-50: dag par bya'o // phung po drug po gzugs sogs ni //
T02D1544:189a-51: sum cu rtsa drug rtag tu mchod //
T02D1544:189a-52: sa chu dang ni me dang rlung //
T02D1544:189a-53: de bzhin khu ba dang na rdul//
T02D1544:189b-0: @189b khams drug tu ni 'di la bshad //
T02D1544:189b-1: lus can rnams kyi gzugs po'o //
T02D1544:189b-2: lkog ma rka na dang spyi bo dang //
T02D1544:189b-3: mchu dang so rjes sna ldan te //
T02D1544:189b-4: 'du shes kyang ni drug tu bshad //
T02D1544:189b-5: dngos dang dngos med ston byed pa //
T02D1544:189b-6: blta dang nyan dang snom pa dang //
T02D1544:189b-7: lce lus yid kyi dbang rnams kyis //
T02D1544:189b-8: mig la sogs pa rnam pa drug / rnam shes phung por bshad pa yin //
T02D1544:189b-9: de bzhin gzugs dang sgra dang ni //
T02D1544:189b-10: dri dang yang ni ro dang ste //
T02D1544:189b-11: reg bya dang ni chos kyi khams //
T02D1544:189b-12: myong ba las ni tshor bar brjod //
T02D1544:189b-13: de bzhin dbang po drug sgo nas //
T02D1544:189b-14: rnam par shes rnams rab 'jug pa //
T02D1544:189b-15: 'du byed rnam pa drug tu brjod //
T02D1544:189b-16: yul rnams la ni 'jug byed pa'i //
T02D1544:189b-17: srog dang rtsol ba'i nyin mtshan gang //
T02D1544:189b-18: steng dang 'og gi lam gsum du //
T02D1544:189b-19: rtsa ni drug po rab rgyu ba //
T02D1544:189b-20: ye shes kyang ni rnam pa drug //
T02D1544:189b-21: sum cu bdun nga sems chen po //
T02D1544:189b-22: sum cu rtsa drug rnal 'byor ma //
T02D1544:189b-23: khams rnams kyis bskor rnal 'byor ba //
T02D1544:189b-24: lha yi gzugs kyis rnal 'byor spyod //
T02D1544:189b-25: rdo rje phag mo'i sngags gang yin //
T02D1544:189b-26: mgrin pa'i mgul dngos rnam par brgyan //
T02D1544:189b-27: lha yi snying po'i sngags kyis ni //
T02D1544:189b-28: phreng ba brgya yi phyed kyis brgyan //
T02D1544:189b-29: yi ge bdun pa'i sngags kyis ni //
T02D1544:189b-30: rna cha yis ni rna ba brgyan //
T02D1544:189b-31: sangs rgyas kun gyi mkha' 'gro mas //
T02D1544:189b-32: lag pa gnyis kyis gdu bu'o //
T02D1544:189b-33: rnal 'byor ma drag sngags kyis ni //
T02D1544:189b-34: ske rags kyis ni rkang pa brgyan //
T02D1544:189b-36: sngags kyis btung ba'i thod pa yin //
T02D1544:189b-37: rnam par snang mdzad sngags gang yin //
T02D1544:189b-38: thod pas mgo bo rnam par brgyan //
T02D1544:189b-39: de ltar bdag nyid rnam bsams nas //
T02D1544:189b-40: tsham dam sngags kyis shin tu bsrung //
T02D1544:189b-41: tshangs par spyod pa rtag 'gyur bas //
T02D1544:189b-43: de ltar legs bsams rnal 'byor bdag //
T02D1544:189b-44: 'jigs pa thams cad rnam par spangs //
T02D1544:189b-45: de nyid rnal 'byor yang dag ldan //
T02D1544:189b-46: rnal 'byor blo ldan rnam par spyod //
T02D1544:189b-47: nges pa'i don gyis lha mo bsgom pa brjod par bya ste /
T02D1544:189b-49: dngos pos stong don mthong phyir ro //
T02D1544:189b-50: sgyu ma rmi lam mig 'phrul bzhin //
T02D1544:189b-51: snang ba tsam gyis ye shes ni //
T02D1544:189b-52: skye med dang bzhin 'jig rten gsum //
T02D1544:189b-53: lus gnas ye shes chen po la //
T02D1544:190a-0: @190a * // kun du rtogs pa thams cad spangs //
T02D1544:190a-1: dngos po kun gyis khyab byed de //
T02D1544:190a-2: lus la gnas kyang lus skyes min //
T02D1544:190a-3: sangs rgyas kun gyis sdom pa ni //
T02D1544:190a-4: aa wam yi ger rab tu gnas //
T02D1544:190a-5: lus ngag yid kyi rtsa gsum la //
T02D1544:190a-6: lus ngag yid kyi dngos po rnams //
T02D1544:190a-7: rdo rje gsum rnams yang dag spyod //
T02D1544:190a-8: dung can mar ni ye shes dngos //
T02D1544:190a-9: de bzhin lha mo mkha' 'gro gdong //
T02D1544:190a-10: ae w'a yi ger rab tu gnas //
T02D1544:190a-11: yi ge ae yis stong nyid rgyu //
T02D1544:190a-12: wam yig gis ni snying rje 'bar //
T02D1544:190a-13: stong nyid snying rje dbyer med la //
T02D1544:190a-14: byang chub sems zhes de la brjod //
T02D1544:190a-15: sems ni nam mkhar zhe na pas ni //
T02D1544:190a-16: mig ni phab ste rdo rje yi //
T02D1544:190a-17: lam du rab tu chud byas pas //
T02D1544:190a-18: stong pa la ni du ba smig rgyu rab gsal dri med srin bu me khyer sgron ma nyid //
T02D1544:190a-19: 'bar ba dang ni zla nyi rdo rje yang ni mchog gi cha ni mthong gyur thig le can //
T02D1544:190a-20: de yi dbus su sangs rgyas gzugs ni yul las rnam grol longs spyod rdzogs sku du ma'o //
T02D1544:190a-21: ji ltar chu la chu 'dres dang //
T02D1544:190a-22: ji ltar mar la mar bzhin du //
T02D1544:190a-23: rang gi ye shes lnga yi dngos //
T02D1544:190a-25: dngos po med la bsgom pa'i dngos //
T02D1544:190a-26: bsgom par bya ba bsgom pa min //
T02D1544:190a-27: de bas dngos po dngos med pas //
T02D1544:190a-28: bsgom pa dmigs su med pa'o //
T02D1544:190a-29: gang su dag gi mthu yis ni //
T02D1544:190a-30: gang du der ni yang dag gnas //
T02D1544:190a-31: dus kyi nges pa yongs spangs pas //
T02D1544:190a-33: de ni sngags bzlas dka' thub ho //
T02D1544:190a-35: phyag rgya chen po'i don bsgoms la //
T02D1544:190a-36: yon tan kun gyi gzhir gyur pa'i //
T02D1544:190a-37: rdo rje stong pa nyid du brjod //
T02D1544:190a-38: phag mo yang ni snying rjer grags //
T02D1544:190a-40: stong nyid snying rje gcig pa la //
T02D1544:190a-41: rdo rje phag mo zhes su brjod //
T02D1544:190a-42: 'di ni bdag gis nges pa'i don bsgom pa bshad pa yin no //
T02D1544:190a-43: dpal rgya nag byang phyogs lam gyi rim pa //
T02D1544:190a-44: rje btsun rdo rje phag mo sgrub pa'i thabs byang
T02D1544:190a-45: chub sems dpa' rgyal po seng ge'i gdong can khyab
T02D1544:190a-46: 'jug spangs pas nges par sbyar ba rdzogs so /
T02D1544:190a-48: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal aa wa dh'u t'i pa chen po //
T02D1544:190a-49: rgyal po'i spas 'jigs med lha'i zhal sngar sh'a kya'i
